snippet.title: BLACKHOLE: Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
BLACKHOLE is an animated 2D sci-fi platform game that includes elements of logic, breathtaking story and audiovisual processing. A player finds himself inside of a black hole where he discovers a whole new world! 

Add the game into your wishlist on STEAM! 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/322680

Game is coming out on 27th February 2015 to Windows PC.
Linux & Mac versions are coming in March 2015.
